FuncDef: This command configures an ingress statistics context matching on the RSVP session name for a RSVP P2P auto-LSP at the egress LER.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the RSVP P2MP session in the format of "templateName-svcId". This field can hold up to 64 characters.
Specifies a string of 15 characters representing the IP address of the ingress LER for the LSP.
